EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-03-27 Multicloud.Last Chance 3/27.Email A
EmailTemplate.subject: =?utf-8?Q?See_You_Tomorrow=3F_=E2=98=81=EF=B8=8F?=
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-containers-multicloud-beyond/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-containers-multicloud-beyond/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With the increasing emphasis on digital applications and services to stay competitive, many organizations are adopting multiple clouds.
We recently surveyed our customers to examine the current and future states of multicloud adoption. The findings point to a multicloud future, one with exponential IT requiring a new approach to AI. Is your organization prepared for a multicloud world?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-containers-multicloud-beyond/]]>
Join us tomorrow at 11 AM ET as we reveal the research and answer questions that you’re likely already facing in your organization:
- Why multicloud? - How do we get there? (Spoiler alert: Containers) - What are the challenges along the way?
Hope to see you there! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-containers-multicloud-beyond/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-containers-multicloud-beyond/]]> and we will send you the recording afterward.
